name: Melissa Freeman
coverLetter: I have been in the cannabis industry as a Trimmer for the past 2 years. I can trim a pound a day, and have a background in cultivation as well. I can identify plant diseases and fungi while making sure bud is manicured and maintain a steady, fast pace. I can work Monday-Friday from 8-4 or 9-5. I have reliable transportation and would love to become an integral part of your team. Thank you for your consideration.
